author: NEWwoman
title: AMERICA Prayer Vigil – 29 December 2023 [Prayer]
text:
As we approach the New Year, 2024 , in the year of our Lord, we yearn for our clean slate, clean heart, fresh start.
As the Psalmist yearns:
Grant us a heart of repentance so we may confess our sins to be washed and made clean. Grant us the desire to know You more in the New Year through the Spirit teaching us as we study Your Word.
We thank You, Father, for the faith of our founding fathers, who sacrificed for a cause greater than themselves.
May we reflect the dark days of the American Revolution, when wrong seemed so strong. Yet, George Washington’s cruiser flew a flag to remind themselves where their help came from:
We thank You for George Washington, who set a high bar as the first president as well as for those in government:
May we remember who we are and stand of the sure foundation of the Promises in Scripture.
This season of celebration of the New Year, may we, the people, turn to God with all our heart and appeal to Heaven for deliverance:
* Reveal all political machinations that have been concealed.
* Deliver us from satanic puppets that are destroying our nation and our people.
* Vindicate and restore President Trump as well as thwart all schemes against him.
* Vindicate and release all J6 political prisoners and grant them justice.
* Convict our hearts and bring us to repentance and salvation and life eternal.
* Spark revival, renewal, restoration, and healing in our land.
And may we continue, without ceasing….:
In Jesus Name,
Amen
G ive thanks to the LORD,
for He is good;
His love endures forever.
Psalm 118:1 (NIV)
Keep praying for America
